titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Missoula School District No. 1 (Missoula, Mont.) Scrapbooks 1939-1966
Missoula School District No. 1 (Missoula, Mont.) Scrapbooks
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Jodi Allison-Bunnell
titlestmt.sponsor: Funding for creating this finding aid was provided through a grant awarded by the National Historic Publications and Records Commission. Funding for encoding this finding aid was provided through a grant awarded by the National Endowment for the Humanities.

publicationstmt.publisher: Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana--Missoula

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Jodi Allison-Bunnell 2004

repository.corpname: University of Montana, Mansfield Library, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Missoula School District No. 1 (Missoula, Mont.) Scrapbooks
did.abstract: The collection consists of two scrapbooks of newspaper clippings compiled by Missoula School District No. 1 (Missoula, Mont.).

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Missoula School District No. 1 provides K-8 (elementary and middle school) education in Missoula, Montana.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two scrapbooks of newspaper clippings compiled by the school district. Most are from local newspapers and are about events in the school district.

accessrestrict.p: Researchers must use collection in accordance with the policies of Archives and Special Collections, the Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, and The University of Montana-Missoula.

userestrict.p: Researchers are responsible for using in accordance with 17 U.S.C. and any other applicable statutes. Copyright not transferred to The University of Montana.

prefercite.p: [Name of document or photograph number], Missoula School District No. 1 (Missoula, Mont.) Scrapbooks, Archives and Special Collections, Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana-Missoula.

acqinfo.p: Received from Missoula School District No. 1, date unknown.

processinfo.p: The collection was originally processed as LC 92 and included teachers registers and payroll records. In 2004, after most of the materials were returned to the school district, the collection was re-described and the finding aid was encoded.

separatedmaterial.p: In 2003, six boxes and twelve volumes of teacher's registers and payroll records were returned to Missoula School District No. 1.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
